ygData.subject: Luclin madness (fix it dammit before coming up with new crap)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It did last time I was there, rumor is they ve made improvements, but I still have yet to find any reason to bother. Nothing I really want from Luclin is
ygData.messageBody:
>For the record, does Luclin run slow for everyone?
>The only time I ever go up there is to get spells for
>my Druid because of the major lag I have had
>there ever since it came out. It takes me twice as
>long to zone there than it does anywhere else in the
>game.

It did last time I was there, rumor is they've made
improvements, but I still have yet to find any reason
to bother. Nothing I really want from Luclin is that
difficult to buy in EC...

Perhaps the upcoming EQ expansion "Planes of Power"
comes with a 2ghz athlon and 500mb of RAM so that
everyone will have the "power" to actually run Luclin
smoothly... *snicker*
